explains: n. 让步，妥协；特许权；<英>优惠价，减价；商铺；小摊卖的东西；认输
wordGroup: concession contract 特许经营权合约；租让制合同

sentences.en: She made no concession to his age; she expected him to work as hard as she did.
sentences.cn: 她丝毫也不体谅他的年龄，要求他干得像她一样卖力。

sentences.en: Finish the following sentence with an adverbial clause of concession.
sentences.cn: 用让步状语从句完成下列句子。

sentences.en: As a concession to his reasonable demand, the doctor allowed him to work.
sentences.cn: 医生向他的合理要求让步了，允许他工作。
